    Syarikat Pendidikan Staffield Berhad (Kolej Tuanku Ja’afar) Vacancies School Librarian and Archivist

    October 25, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Highlights
    • Additional Information
    • How To Apply

    Syarikat Pendidikan Staffield Berhad (Kolej Tuanku Ja'afar) is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for School Librarian and Archivist position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Highlights

    • 19% EPF Employer's Contribution
    • Medical benefit
    • Meals provided

    Additional Information

    Career Level
    Senior Executive
    Qualification
    Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree
    Years of Experience
    5 years
    Job Type
    Full-Time
    Job Specializations
    Education/Training, Education

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Negeri Sembilan - Others.
